WorkItem.Description:
In Vista Ultimate 64-bit, at startup time, I get an Unhandled exception during the splash screen which contains a big red X.  If I click continue to ignore the error, the app continues loading and seems to work fine.

Comments.Message: Odd, seems that you don't have one of the basic system fonts; I don't know why you wouldn't have it, unless it was specifically removed from your installation of Vista.
I get the exact same big red cross and basically the exact same same dialogue, only difference is i'm using XP and after i click continue the program shuts down .
